TAH_WITCHER.noDetailsAvailable: There are no detailed information available for this item.

Settings.rollSkillsNativelyHint: If checked, it will use the Systems exposed method for rolling skills. This only works with version 'v0.97-alpha.4' and higher. It will use a fallback method if you are using an incompable version.
Settings.sortSkillsAlphabeticallyHint: If checked, all skills are sorted from A to Z within their category.
Settings.showSkillCategoriesHint: If checked, all skills are put into their specific stat-category. Otherwise, they will be all shown next to each other.
Settings.showSkillSuffixHint: Determines if a suffix should be shown behind the skills. "Only if skilled" - spent skillpoints + modifiers > 0
Settings.skillSuffixHint: The type of suffix that should be shown. "Skillpoints" - The actual number of points you have spent for a skill + all modifiers. "Basevalue" - The Skillpoints + current stat value.
Settings.showMagicStaCostHint: If checked, the stamina cost will be shown behind each spell.
Settings.magicVarStaCostLabelHint: If STA-Cost are shown, this is the label that is shown behind spells with variable cost. If you leave this empty, nothing will be shown.
Settings.skillSettingsHint: Select which skills should be shown.
Settings.showToAllHint: If checked, everyone will be shown a chat message when someone consumes a item. Otherwise, only the consumer and the gamemaster can see it.
Settings.showQuestItemsHint: If checked, quest items will appear under "Interesting Items". Quest Items do only exist in The Witcher TRPG v0.97-alpha.4 or higher.
Settings.showUnsupportedSystemMessageHint: If checked, the GM will be notified upon startup if the installed system version is not fully compatible with this module.

Chat.actorConsumedOil: I have applied a blade coating to my weapon!
Chat.actorConsumedAlchemicalItem: I have used an alchemical item!
Chat.actorConsumedPotion: I have consumed a Witcher potion!
Chat.actorConsumedDecoction: I have consumed a Witcher decoction!

UnsupportedVersion.title: System version not fully compatible
UnsupportedVersion.content:
Some features of Token Action HUD The Witcher TRPG may not work properly with your current system version '%version'. Therefore, I recommend installing version v0.97-alpha.4 or higher. You can find the installation guide here.

The features that do not work correctly or at all include:

  • There are no quest items
  • Images of items in the inventory cannot be displayed enlarged
  • Skills are not rolled natively
